post_text: Throughout the Fulton City School District, we believe in transparency and setting goals to better ourselves as administrators, teachers, staff members and it is our hope that together we may help students attend school all day, every day. Family engagement and support is a vital support to help us all meet our attendance goals. While we recognize there are certain circumstances which prevent that some days, we are here to help students and their families work on their personal attendance goals. post_text: Effective today, the Fulton City School District will utilize the Raptor Visitor Management System at all buildings to strengthen the campus safety of all students and staff members. The tool will allow us to screen visitors, contractors and volunteers in each of the schools. Visitors must present a photo identification card or passport in order to be signed in and obtain a pre-printed badge, which must be worn at all times. When leaving the building one is visiting, guests will return to where they signed in and hand in the badge, which enables an attendant to sign the guest out. For more information, please review our website, www.fultoncsd.org. #FultonCSD
